name: Solar System (itch) (Yiwei Wu)
description:
I made the partial simulation of solar system. In this game, you can click on any planet so that the carema will follow.

In addition to the Sun and Earth, I added the following elemenets:

  1. Mercury,
  2.  Venus, 
  3. Jupiter, as well as Lo, Europa, Ganymede which are satellites of Jupiter. 

Credits 

Created by Yiwei Wu
